Opendata.TitleOpendata.content: Find the main sources of scanR in the form of data sets under open license
Opendata.ApiScanr.content: scanR offers several APIs (Application Programming Interface) to facilitate the use and retrieval of available information. It is these APIs that are mobilized in this site to manage the search and retrieval of their information
Opendata.RNSR: French National Directory of Research Structures
